name: Divi Content Restrictor
author: WP Tools

sections.installation:
1. Upload content-restrictor-for-divi to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the “Divi Content Restrictor” plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Any there any dependencies for this plugin?

This plugin has the following dependencies.

  • Divi Theme by Elegant Themes
  • Restrict Content Pro (Optional)
  • MemberPress (Optional)
  • WooCommerce Membership (Optional)
sections.changelog:
1.5.0

  • php8.1 compatibility
  • WordPress compatible

1.4.3

  • Freemius upgrade

1.4.2

  • Updated freemius
  • WordPress 6.2 compatible

1.4.1

  • Updated freemius version.

1.4.0

  • Fix unauthorized text html stripping with ‘Restrict Content Pro’

1.3.0

  • Fixed issue with “Restrict Content Pro” settings – the membership and access level were outputting incorrect options.

1.2.0

  • Fixed an issue with “WooCommerce Membership” content restriction where unauthorized text was not being shown for member not belonging to a plan.
  • Compatible with WordPress 5.7.1

1.1.0

[//]: # fs_premium_only_begin
* Restrict content via a custom filter. Check https://gist.github.com/wpt00ls/2a0bcdfb4cdfbe1c9cf69e0ea18ba3ab for detailed example.
[//]: # fs_premium_only_end
* Freemius SDK updated to 2.4.2

1.0.1

  • Deployment on wordpress.org

1.0.0

  • Added content restrict for
    • Logged-In User
    • User Roles
    • MemberPress Plugin
    • WooCommerce Membership Plugin
    • Restrict Content Pro Plugin
sections.description:
Conditionally restrict partial content on divi page. Divi visual builder compatible. Grant access to logged-in users, users belonging to any/all selected roles. Integration with third-party plugins like “WooCommerce Membership”, “MemberPress”, “Restrict Content Pro” & “Custom WordPress Filter”.

Restrict Content On Divi Page

Conditionally restrict access to partial content on a divi section

100% divi visual builder compatibility.

This plugin restricts content on divi section. Its 100% compatible with divi visual builder.

We’ve added Restrict Content & Un-Authorized Text settings toggle on divi section module. Its on the Advanced tab

In the Restrict Content toggle, setup all the conditions for restricting content like

  • Show content to logged-in users
  • Show content to users with specific roles (Premium Version)
  • Show content based on third-party plugin’s like
    • Restrict Content Pro (Premium Version)
    • MemberPress (Premium Version)
    • WooCommerce Membership (Premium Version)

In the Un-Authorized Text settings toggle, set the un-authorized text message and text styles.

Restrict content on all section types. For example regular, full-width and specialty divi sections

Premium

Premium plugin is available at https://wptools.app/wordpress-plugin/divi-content-restrictor/

Features are:

  • Content restriction using User Roles
  • Content restriction using WooCommerce Memberships plugin
  • Content restriction using Restrict Content Pro plugin
  • Content restriction using MemberPress plugin
  • Content restriction using Custom WordPress Filter
